jobTitle: Director of Global Alliances - Remote | WFH
description:
We're seeking a dynamic Director of Global Alliances to join our team and expand our reach within the distribution, healthcare, and retail industries. You'll be instrumental in forging strong partnerships and driving revenue growth through strategic alliances.

What You'll Do

Build Powerful Partnerships: Cultivate and nurture relationships with key partners in the supply chain ecosystem.

Develop Winning Strategies: Create and execute joint go-to-market plans that drive mutual success.

Lead and Inspire: Motivate and empower cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals.

Drive Revenue Growth: Identify and capture new business opportunities through strategic partnerships.

Become an Industry Expert: Stay up-to-date on industry trends and leverage your knowledge to drive innovation.

What You'll Bring

10+ years of experience in partner development or alliance management in the software/tech industry.

A proven track record of building and managing successful partnerships.

Strong business acumen and the ability to think strategically.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build relationships at all levels.

A passion for collaboration and teamwork.

Bonus Points

Experience in the healthcare industry.

Knowledge of supply chain technologies.

What We Offer

The opportunity to shape the future of our business through strategic partnerships.

A collaborative and supportive work environment.

The chance to work with a talented and passionate team.

If you're a relationship builder with a strategic mindset, we encourage you to apply!

Employment Type: Full-Time
responsibilities:
Build Powerful Partnerships: Cultivate and nurture relationships with key partners in the supply chain ecosystem.

Develop Winning Strategies: Create and execute joint go-to-market plans that drive mutual success.

Lead and Inspire: Motivate and empower cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals.

Drive Revenue Growth: Identify and capture new business opportunities through strategic partnerships.

Become an Industry Expert: Stay up-to-date on industry trends and leverage your knowledge to drive innovation.

10+ years of experience in partner development or alliance management in the software/tech industry.
A proven track record of building and managing successful partnerships.
Strong business acumen and the ability to think strategically.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build relationships at all levels.
